title: SMC_ChangeAxisScalingLinear (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_ChangeAxisScalingLinear
This function block changes the scaling (increments per technical units),
of a linear axis.
The drive must not be enabled with
MC_Power
, otherwise error
SMC_CGR_DRIVE_POWERED
is returned.
An automatic reinitialization of the drive is done in order to guarantee
that all variables are initialized in a correct way.

rows.Name: Execute
rows.Comment: Rising edge: starts the execution of the function block.

rows:
The units that correspond toIncrements. In technical
units [u].
Whether the direction of the axis is inverted or not.
Modulo period (only for modulo axes) in technical units [u].

rows.Name: Done
rows.Comment: TRUE: The scaling has been changed.

rows:
TRUE: Execution of function block has not been finished
yet.
